description: Yuigadokusonmaru (唯我独尊丸, Yuigadokusonmaru), often called just Dokusonmaru (独尊丸, Dokusonmaru) for short, is Kasuka Heiwajima`s cat. He is sent to live with Anri Sonohara to protect him from Kisuke Adabashi. He runs away after Kisuke attacks Anri and he is saved by Mikado Ryuugamine.
name: Yuigadokusonmaru
